The goal of the Irvine CERT program is to provide private citizens with the basic skills they will need to protect themselves, their family, and neighbors, and to respond to the immediate needs of the community in the aftermath of a disaster when emergency services are not readily available.  Furthermore it is our goal to have an active CERT member on each street or at each business in Irvine.  By working together, CERT members can assist in saving lives and protecting property using the basic techniques in this course.

summary: Contact me at linkedin@lightcubed.com if you feel we can assist each other's networking efforts.Currently leading the technical exploits of Flash Point Communications, LLC.  Please feel free to contact me if you need help with anything from strategy to social media to production work.  We can handle projects of any size given our internal resources and network of contacts in the industry.Formerly, I led the team of developers responsible for technical development and QA for Lincoln.com, MercuryVehicles.com (RIP), LincolnMercury.com (RIP) and other sites.Specialties: XML, HTML, JavaScript, usability, CSS, ASP, JSP, PHP, SQL, MySQL, Interwoven Teamsite, problem solving, team building, cat herding.  Over ten years of professional Internet / New Media experience.
